{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3169510,"name":"Benjamin Broudy","username":"Benjamin_Broudy","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/5e9695/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-21T16:17:29.021Z","cooked":"

Our bumpers have been significantly ripped up from our arm and rubbing against our wooden grid. Ive been able to sew it up so far, but yesterday a certain area was damaged to the point that it looks like someone put it through a meat grinder. Am I allowed to patch it with a piece of material cut out from spare bumper material? I havent found anything obvious in the game manual but I want to make sure Im not missing anything.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2023-03-21T16:17:29.021Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":165,"readers_count":164,"score":58.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":431136,"topic_slug":"patching-bumper-with-more-bumper-material","display_username":"Benjamin Broudy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52302,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/patching-bumper-with-more-bumper-material/431136/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3169524,"name":"Peter Matteson","username":"Peter_Matteson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_matteson/{size}/136196_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-21T16:32:19.337Z","cooked":"

Yes you are. We had to patch our sailcloth bumpers and used self adhesive sail repair tape. If you are in the same boat a quick web search will help you locate some.
Here is are 2 examples.

sailmakerssupply.com

Repair Tape for Sails and Sailboats | Sailmaker's Supply

We sell repair tape for sails and marine canvas on boats. This is the same high quality repair tape used by sailmakers and marine canvas professionals.

sailrite.com

Marine Repair & Maintenance Tape

Stay prepared for anything with sail repair tape from Sailrite, where we have quality marine tape for Dacron, Ripstop and more.
